mapper.select: select id,org_id,expected from getorginfobyid where id = #{id};

select id,builtIn,orgType,orgCategory,orgCode,logoImg,orgName,nickName, unifiedSocialCreditCode,regCapital,regAddress,legalRepPerson,openBank, openBackAccount,officeAddress,contactMobile,orgAddress,orgWebSite, orgEmail,description,securityCertCode,businessLicenseCode, pimmLicense,accountOpenLicenseCode,'delete',addTime,updateTime, province,city,area,incorporationDate,businessScope, operatingStatus,industry,orgLevelCode,contractorContractList, isItemCompany,orgCategoryName,proCode,searchKey,parentId, deptId,kname,parentCompany,operatingStatusName,industryName, orgLevelName from organizationinfo where id = #{org_id};
